thread.title: BRIEF-Liquidity Services reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.04

title: BRIEF-Liquidity Services reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.04
text:
06 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Liquidity Services reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.04 Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Liquidity Services Inc: 
* LIQUIDITY SERVICES ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS 
* SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.16 TO $0.23 * SEES Q2 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 TO $0.26 * Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.20 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* ANTICIPATES LAUNCH OF NEW CONSOLIDATED MARKETPLACE ON LIQUIDITYONE E-COMMERCE PLATFORM BY END OF CALENDAR YEAR 2018 
* NEAR-TERM OUTLOOK REMAINS “CAUTIOUS”, BUT EXPECT TO REALIZE IMPROVEMENTS ACROSS BUSINESSES DURING FY18 
* IN Q2-FY18, EXPECT CONTINUED GROWTH IN RSCG AND GOVDEALS SEGMENTS 
* Q1-FY18 GMV OF $155.4 MILLION, DOWN FROM $159.7 MILLION IN PRIOR YEAR‘S COMPARABLE PERIOD * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $61.1 MILLION VERSUS $70.8 MLN‍​ 
* EXPECT GMV FOR Q2-18 TO RANGE FROM $150 MILLION TO $170 MILLION. 
* EXPECT GAAP DILUTED LOSS PER SHARE FOR Q2-18 TO RANGE FROM $0.26 TO $0.19 
* EXPECT NON-GAAP ADJUSTED LOSS PER DILUTED SHARE FOR Q2-18 TO RANGE FROM $0.23 TO $0.16 Source text for Eikon:
